articles.title: 🔥 Default templates
articles.desc: It is now possible to choose a default template for new campaigns to speed up your creation process.

articles.title: 🔥 REST API
articles.desc: A new REST API capability has been added to AcyMailing and can be activated in the security tab of the configuration.

articles.title: 🔥 Better click statistics handling
articles.desc: The way the click statistics are stored have been improved to increase load speed and reduce needed resources.

splash_content.title: DISCOVER WHAT CHANGED FOR BUG FIXES

articles.title: 🛠️ Better phone field handling
articles.desc: Improved the way the phone custom field is handled when migrating data from AcyMailing 5.

articles.title: 🛠️ Average user click rate
articles.desc: The average click rate in a user profile is now correctly calculated based on click rate and not open rate.

articles.title: 🛠️ Fixed date picker glitch in automatic campaigns
articles.desc: When modifying a saved start date in an existing automatic campaign, the date picker was not loading it.

articles.title: 🛠️ Attachment with apostrophe
articles.desc: Attachments with an apostrophe in their name are now correctly handled.

articles.title: 🛠️ Segments with OR condition
articles.desc: Excluded segments that contain an OR condition are now correctly handled when sending a campaign.

articles.title: 🛠️ Vertical padding for mobile
articles.desc: Fixed vertical padding for mobile view in the editor.

articles.title: 🧩 Added field labels on article insertion
articles.desc: The label is now displayed when inserting Joomla articles that have custom fields.

articles.title: 🧩 Show campaigns sent to allowed lists
articles.desc: A new option has been added to let you show the campaigns sent to allowed lists in the front-end management menu.

articles.title: 🧩 EventBooking category filter
articles.desc: With the EventBooking add-on you can now use the category of the event as a filter in the automation.

articles.title: 🧩 Lists access level check
articles.desc: Fixed the access level check for allowed templates use on the front-end management menu when creating a campaign.

articles.title: 🧩 Default list selection
articles.desc: Fixed the default selected list when creating a welcome or unsub email from the front-end management menu of a list.

articles.title: 🧩 Timezone issue with Joomla articles
articles.desc: Fixed a timezone issue when inserting Joomla articles with a date custom field when the timezone is different on the server and the Joomla configuration.

articles.title: 🧩 Click tracking for auto-login links
articles.desc: The click tracking has been fixed for auto-login links to inserted articles in some specific cases.

articles.title: 🧩 WooCommerce guest customers
articles.desc: The WooCommerce last purchased products insertion is now available for guest customers.

articles.title: 🧩 PHP deprecation warning
articles.desc: Fixed PHP deprecated warning on PHP 8.1.

articles.title: 🧩 Gravity Forms submission
articles.desc: Fixed Gravity Forms submission not triggering on the right action.

articles.title: 🧩 Gravity Forms protection
articles.desc: Fixed Gravity Forms XSS security when showing AcyMailing list names.

articles.title: 🎁 Better click statistics handling
articles.desc: The way the click statistics are stored have been improved to increase load speed and reduce needed resources.

articles.title: 🎁 Better queue listing
articles.desc: The queue listing has been optimised to handle a large number of scheduled campaigns and use less resources.

articles.title: 🎁 REST API
articles.desc: A new REST API capability has been added to AcyMailing and can be activated in the security tab of the configuration.

articles.title: 🎁 Default templates
articles.desc: It is now possible to choose a default template for new campaigns to speed up your creation process.

articles.title: 🎁 Change user groups in automations
articles.desc: Added the possibility to change the user account groups with saved scenarios in automations.

articles.title: 🎁 Telegram social icon
articles.desc: Added a telegram Icon in the social media block.
